headline: Interactive Brokers Taps Stablecoins To Support Global Growth Story
summary: Interactive Brokers Group (NasdaqGS:IBKR) now allows clients to fund brokerage accounts using stablecoins. The new option is designed to offer near-instant, 24/7 deposits and immediate access to trading across global markets. The rollout targets international investors who face delays and higher costs with traditional cross-border bank transfers. Interactive Brokers Group, trading at $75.45, sits at the intersection of brokerage and fintech, and this stablecoin funding feature aligns with...
